<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gossip Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1937) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 167 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dandy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=55)

**Prerequisites**
[Dandy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1935)

</column>

---

Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic. You are trained in [Gossip Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), a special Lore skill that can be used only to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Gossip Lore, you get the effects of the [Dubious Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=776) skill feat.

 If you have legendary proficiency in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14), you gain expert proficiency in Gossip Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Gossip Lore by any other means.
name: Gossip Lore
